item.title: Politics Potpourri
item.description: There exist datasets for how legislators vote in Congress. Intellectual puzzles abound, e.g. # dimensions needed to meaningfully predict voting, party loyalty of members, etc. In the aftermath of the Capitol insurrection, FBI was contacting people whose cellphones pinged cell towers near the Capitol during the riots. LAPD requested Ring footage of BLM protests. Ring has partnerships with law enforcement, e.g. enabling them to make bulk requests to Ring users.
